Text: RePST Hi I have removed you from our subscription list as you requested This may take up to hours to process so it is possible that you will receive up to two more messages You have complete control over the emails you receive from ClearStation to disable the emails or to enable them again at a later time Go to FOCUS and then Customize on the top line of the ClearStation nav bar Under the Email Subscriptions heading uncheck the box for the list you wish to unsubscribe Click on Apply Changes at the top to save the changes Let me know if you have any other questions or need any help with this Regards Debbie ClearStation Support At AM you wrote please take me off your mailing list This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
